summary: Some retextures for the UNP Armored Bikini
descriptionHtml:
This are some retextures for the Armored Bikini by Ortog.
They are not really lore friendly, so if you care about that, this mod is not for you.

This is not standalone.
You will need to install the Armored Bikini mod by Ortog first.
Find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10020

It is for the UNP Body by Dimon99, so you will need to have that installed as well.
It is made for the standard UNP Body, but i think the textures will work with the skinny
version as well.

My mod contains only the texture files.
In case of the Latex Net Bikini and the Leaves Bikini, i added the mesh as well 
because of the transparency.

It is a retexture for the Bikini only, not for the other clothes included in Ortogs mod.
(like Boots, Gauntlets, Stockings...)


Installation:
Chose ONE of the retextures and place my files in the Armored BikiniÂ´s texture Folder.
Usually it is this:  C:\\programs\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Clothes\\UNP bikini\\

In case of the Latex Net  or Leaves Bikini, also place the meshes in the correct folder.
Usually it is this: C:\\programs\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\Clothes\\UNP bikini\\


Credits:
Thank you Ortog for creating the original Armored Bikini and for allowing me to
release this retextures.

Thank you Dimon99 for creating the stunningly beautiful UNP Body.
author: Kaleeon
